Class FireCube::FrameBufferResource

   in FrameBuffer.h
class FireCube::FrameBufferResource

A class representing a frame buffer.

AddRenderTarget

Adds a new render target.

attachmentPoint - The attachment point to add to.

Create

public void Create( int width, int height );
Creates a frame buffer.
Parameters:
width - The width of the frame buffer and it's sub-images(depth buffer, render targets).
height - The height of the frame buffer and it's sub-images(depth buffer, render targets).

Checks whether the frame buffer is valid and can be rendered to.

SetRenderTarget

public void SetRenderTarget( Texture texture, int attachmnetPoint );
Sets a render target from an already existing texture.
Parameters:
texture - The texture.
attachmentPoint - The attachment point to add to.
